chatbot.evidence: The customer mentioned being routed from one bot to another.
chatbot.description: The customer is complaining about not being able to log in to their Vodamail email.
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot's ability to assist with technical issues and provide better support for email login problems.

complaint.description: The customer is unable to access their Vodamail email since yesterday and has been unsuccessful in contacting support.
complaint.suggestion: Investigate and resolve the issue causing the login problem for the customer's Vodamail email.

meta.review_content: Since yesterday i can not access my vodacom email at vodamail. i have been trying to contact them but no luck. just routed from one bot to another. why can i not log in my email?
